article_title: Trump triumphs as 2016 MockCon presidential nominee
article_text:
Towe Insurance Service Inc

Celebrating 81 years in business in 2015The Towe Insurance Service Inc. team is committed to providing clients with the highest quality insurance plans available combined with some of the lowest rates available in all of Virginia. Whether you’re shopping for auto insurance, home insurance, health, life or business insurance, we can help get you the best coverage available with the lowest rate possible. Towe Insurance was welcomed into the Keystone Insurers Group in 2008.Keystone Insurers Group is a consortium of independent insurance agencies presently operating in six states. KIG is highly selective; franchisees are comprised of the most successful, deeply experienced agencies committed to teamwork and honest communication. Customers of Keystone Partner agents reap the benefits of comprehensive insurance protection, competitive pricing and innovative solutions through the exchange of intellectual capital. A founding principle of KIG is to do with peers what can’t be done alone.Access to more insurance company programs, along with the expertise of other, similarly successful agencies means our customers have the advantage of:◾Access to more insurance company programs.◾Shared expertise of other, similarly successful agencies.◾Additional knowledge that collaborative services allows.◾Cutting edge enhancements to your business management strategies.◾Superior local service.At Towe Insurance Service Inc., our ultimate goal is to create lasting relationships with each of our clients so that we may continue providing excellent service for many years to come.Call or visit us Today

og.description: LEXINGTON -- Donald Trump may later reflect on Saturday as a true harbinger of his presidential prospects after he captured the GOP presidential nomination at Washington and Lee University’s 2016 Mock Convention.
